instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: Macbook 13 inch 2015 backlight "issue"
threads.message: Hi guys I had a mac that kept rebooting and no backlight. Corrosion SMC_Reset_L circuit and backlight circuit. Changed all and backlight works. However, the backlight only turns on if the Mac is about 50% pass booting. If i use Option command the backlight is off, when using Command + R its off and I can see apple logo, after it turns on and boots fine into the menu. I have our own Mac in the office and it behaves the same leading me to think its a software/firmware issue, it only happened after we updated it. Customer is freaking out though and keeps saying I have to fix it :), ideas?

threads.title: Macbook 13 inch 2015 backlight "issue"
threads.message:
Do you have original Magsafe 2 charger?
Try first PRAM reset, of course...

threads.title: Macbook 13 inch 2015 backlight "issue"
threads.message: Yes and yes i tried PRAM/SMC reset.

threads.title: Macbook 13 inch 2015 backlight "issue"
threads.message:
I think heard this before, happened after update.
If machine works and even boot menu appears, explain to the client it is repaired...
